EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_CTO_7_App_Note
EmailTemplate.subject: Leverage secure service enablement for advanced roaming
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Evolve your network to support advanced roaming As the world’s biggest operators shift to VoLTE and VoWiFi, they will increasingly expect their network partners to provide the same technology for subscribers who roam.
In this application note, you will get insights on:
- The peering and interconnect architecture needed to support VoLTE and VoWiFi - How to deploy this architecture without adding complexity or compromising performance - How Secure Service Enablement provides some key functions to support advanced roaming Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
